name: PPE Donning and Doffing Skill Training
name_original: PPE Donning and Doffing Skill Training
description:
In this game, all the items of PPE that are to be put on during donning and doffing procedures will be displayed and the players have to select the correct items from the inventory in a stepwise manner.

A wrong selection will not be accepted and the player will be required to

pick the correct item, likewise, the player learns the correct steps. After every step of donning, a questionnaire will follow, which will help the player memorize the steps easily. 

After completing the correct donning process, the player will proceed with the doffing procedure, and similarly as in donning, the correct steps of

doffing are to be followed, accompanied by a questionnaire related to each step of doffing.
